cause.description:
It's currently Hepatitis Awareness month; please support, even if not donations.
Donations are sent to the Hepatitis Foundation International directly. If each member donated $1, we could make such an impact in the lives of men and women everywhere.
1. Diagnosing Hepatitis early.
2. Preventing more cases of Hepatitis.
3. Creating new medicines and treatments for Hepatitis.
cause.mission: raise money for Hepatitis research and cures.
cause.name: Hepatitis Foundation International
